subject: Mobile Phone facility to PDs of level of Manager (Tech)
text: 9-iy 771 RTTTf qerabrut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (7335 9R67 3 TTTHNf Hua4) Extn_ 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) 6-5 & 6, Sector-10_ Dwarka_ New Delhi-110045 No.11041/21/2002-Admn: September 8, 2003 POLICY MATTERS ADMNSTRATIONFINANCE (55 /2003) (Decision taken on Admn:'s File No.11041/21/2002-Admn:) Sub:: Extension of _Mobile Phone Facility It has been decided to extend the mobile phone facility to the Project Directors of thelevel of_Manager _(TechJ; subject to the following conditions: - The Project Directors of_the_Jevel_of_Managers should not have been provided with the facility of mobile phone as a part of contract provision of any project  ii) The cost of mobile instrument should not exceed Rs.10,000/ iii) The monthly charges including rental charges should not exceed Rs.1,000/- 2. This issues with the approval of Chairman: Ssqanalai (S.Loganlathan) General Manager (Admn:) To All Project Directors [of the level of Manager (Tech: )] of PIUs [cmug |stVc .
